James Stavig
============

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)
Title: Councilmember
Phone:
360-755-0531

Current Term: January 1, 2022 - December 31, 2025

James Stavig and his wife have lived in Burlington for approximately 9 years. James is a Certified Management Accountant for a local boat manufacturer. He has a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Management and a Master's Degree in Business Administration. James was born in Seattle, Washington but was raised down South for most of his childhood. James enjoys snow skiing, cycling, mountaineering, and camping. James volunteers his time with Habitat for Humanity, Skagit Humane Society and Community Action of Skagit County.

James is Chair of the Lodging Tax Committee, and serves on the Public Works Committee, Public Safety Committee, Americans with Disabilities Committee, and Downtown Burlington Association. James is also an alternate on the North Star Advisory Committee. He looks forward to working with the citizens and businesses in Burlington.
